channel.title: itunes on notes to self
channel.description: Recent content in itunes on notes to self

item.title: Can not select Airport Express remote speakers
item.description: I have a first generation Airport Express which works flawlessly with iPad and iPhone. But when I try to select remote speakers from iTunes it deselects the tickbox as soon as I click on it. Usually osx restart helps, but it only lasts until I switch network or loose connectivity to wifi. Expressively inconvenient I have to say. I’m not alone, but it doesn’t mean that there is a straightforward answer out there.

item.title: Never ever buy a movie from iTunes
item.description: Now this is getting ridiculous. When you buy a movie from iTunes you cannot watch this on your external screen. Yes, seriously. You can not plug in your second monitor, or your 1000$ 30" Apple Cinema Display, drag your iTunes window to that screen and hit play. It just won’t work. And apparently it’s due to a thing called High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection (HDCP). Something fancy that Apple added to all Macbook and Macbook Pro’s made after 2008.
